meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of pornography.
meanings.sent1: The movie had some porny scenes that made me uncomfortable.
meanings.sent2: She wore a porny outfit to the party, attracting a lot of attention.
meanings.sent3: The cake was decorated in a porny way, with inappropriate icing designs.
meanings.sent4: The music video was so porny, it felt like a visual overload.
meanings.sent5: The art exhibit featured some truly porny paintings that shocked the viewers.

meanings.definition: Having qualities or characteristics associated with pornography.
meanings.sent1: The website had a porny feel to it, with explicit content everywhere.
meanings.sent2: His jokes were often crude and porny, making some people uncomfortable.
meanings.sent3: The fashion show took a porny turn when the models started wearing revealing outfits.
meanings.sent4: The novel had a dark and porny undertone, exploring taboo subjects.
meanings.sent5: The advertisement used a lot of suggestive imagery, making it seem quite porny.
